Export.Routine:
#include %occErrors #include %ZEN.Utils #define get(%name) $get(%request.Data(%name,1)) #define Debug $d(%request.Data("Debug")) #define R(%property) %request.Content.##Expression(%property) #define Public ((%request.GetCgiEnv("SERVER_PORT") = 80) || (%request.GetCgiEnv("SERVER_PORT") = 443)) #define Private '$$$Public
#; For work with dynamic objects #if $$$comClassDefined("%Library.Array") #define NewDynObj ##class(%Object).%New() #define NewDynDTList ##class(%Array).%New() #define NewDynObjList $$$NewDynDTList #define Insert(%obj,%element) do %obj.$push(%element) #define DynObjToJSON(%obj) do %obj.$toJSON() #define ListToJSON(%obj) $$$DynObjToJSON(%obj) #else #define NewDynObj ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() #define NewDynDTList ##class(%ListOfDataTypes).%New() #define NewDynObjList ##class(%ListOfObjects).%New() #define Insert(%obj,%element) do %obj.Insert(%element) #define DynObjToJSON(%obj) do %obj.%ToJSON() #define ListToJSON(%obj) do ##class(%ZEN.Auxiliary.jsonProvider).%ObjectToJSON(%obj) #endif
